wikipedia_page.main: Gavin Liddle (born 9 May 1963) is an English former footballer who made 33 appearances in the Football League playing as a full back for Darlington in the 1980s. He also played non-league football for clubs including Spennymoor United, Bishop Auckland, Harrogate Town, Birtley Town, Washington Nissan, and Red House WMC. He went into coaching and management at a local level, as player-manager of Birtley Town, manager of Harrogate Town, coach and then for four years manager of Washington Nissan, with whom he won two Wearside League titles, and manager of Prudhoe.
